sentences.en: A harelip is not a big defect, it can be remedied through an operation.
sentences.cn: 缺嘴并不是大缺陷, 完全可以通过手术矫治.

sentences.en: Conclusion Functional repair of harelip is a satisfaction method of repairing harelip so far.
sentences.cn: 结论功能性唇裂修复术是目前较理想的唇裂修复方法.

sentences.en: He had a harelip in the past, but now his lips look normal after the operation.
sentences.cn: 他原来是个豁子, 现在做了手术已经看不出来了.

sentences.en: His son was born with harelip.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子生下来就患有裂唇症.

sentences.en: In walks this man -- short, ugly, balding and speaking with a strange harelip.
sentences.cn: 那个人走进来 —— 又矮, 又丑, 还秃顶,嘴上带着奇怪的唇裂.

sentences.en: In walks this man -- short, ugly, balding, and speaking with a strange harelip.
sentences.cn: 那个人走进来——又矮，又丑，还秃顶，嘴上带着奇怪的唇裂。

sentences.en: Such as harelip and heart can check out first?
sentences.cn: 比如兔唇和先心能否检查出来？

sentences.en: The rest were diagnosed respectively as harelip, spinal bifida and hernia of brin.
sentences.cn: 其余3例分别经胎儿镜确诊为唇裂 、 脊柱裂及脑疝.

sentences.en: Those born with a harelip or buck teeth may not be able to speak clearly.
sentences.cn: 那些天生有唇裂或龅牙的人,也许会口齿不清.

sentences.en: Why does a baby suffer a harelip ? Is there any prevention?
sentences.cn: 兔唇宝宝是怎样造成的，能有效预防吗？

sentences.en: With Ivan's help, one hospital did a free harelip operation for Kate.
sentences.cn: 在伊凡的帮助下, 一家医院为凯特做了免费的唇裂修复手术.

trans.tran_en: an offensive word for the condition of having your top lip divided into two parts because it did not develop correctly before birth
